question.content:
The frequency table below shows how many months old each of Jimmy's nine children was when they began to walk.  

Number of months old | Number of children
:-: | :-: 
$9$ | $2$
$10$ | $3$
$11$ | $2$
$12$ | $2$


**Using this data, create a dot plot where each dot represents a child.**
[[☃ plotter 1]]
